title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document the comprehensive requirements for the InfrastructureAsCodeObserver project, detailing the specific monitoring and observability needs for infrastructure-as-code environments. This includes outlining the expected features, target user personas, potential constraints or assumptions, and identifying any existing tools or methodologies that may need to be integrated or replaced. Upon completion, a clear and concise requirements document will be prepared and shared with relevant stakeholders.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the InfrastructureAsCodeObserver, including the components, data flow, and integration points with infrastructure-as-code tools and monitoring systems.

title: Plan Security and Compliance
description: Identify and address security and compliance requirements for the InfrastructureAsCodeObserver, such as data encryption, access control, and regulatory compliance.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Design the user interface and experience for the InfrastructureAsCodeObserver, including dashboards, alerts, and reporting capabilities.

title: Develop Backend and Data Processing
description: Implement the backend components of the InfrastructureAsCodeObserver, including data ingestion, processing, and storage for monitoring and observability data.

title: Integrate with Infrastructure-as-Code Tools
description: Develop integrations with popular infrastructure-as-code tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation, Ansible) to enable monitoring and observability of configuration changes and deployments.

title: Develop Monitoring and Alerting Capabilities
description: Implement monitoring and alerting features for the InfrastructureAsCodeObserver, including performance metrics, anomaly detection, and customizable alerts.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the InfrastructureAsCodeObserver, covering installation, configuration, usage, and troubleshooting.

title: Implement Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute a comprehensive testing strategy for the InfrastructureAsCodeObserver, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end testing.

title: Plan Deployment and Operations
description: Develop a deployment and operations plan for the InfrastructureAsCodeObserver, including infrastructure provisioning, continuous integration and delivery, and monitoring and maintenance procedures.
